inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of SCI, MS, AMP, MD or LBP
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: moderate to severe chronic pain possibly related to MS, SCI, AMP, MD, or LBP that is persistent in nature
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to read, speak, and understand English
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: severe cognitive impairment defined as two or more errors on the Six-Item Screen
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: psychiatric condition or symptoms that would interfere with participation
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Parkinson's disease, but no diagnosis of SCI, MS, AMP, MD or LBP. He experiences chronic pain possibly related to his condition.
